pkgmetadata.longdescription:
appimaged will monitor .AppImage files then add .desktop files to run them. When .AppImage is removed, it will clean itself up.
The following directories will be monitored recursively for .AppImage(s): ~/.local/bin ~/Downloads ~/bin ~/.bin ~/Applications /Applications /opt /usr/local/bin /opt/AppImage # A system-wide Gentoo addition (tentative / testing)
There is a lag time if a lot of files are located in these folders. To speed it it up, either mod this package or remove content.
The patch location to modify can be found at: https://github.com/AppImage/appimaged/blob/master/src/main.c#L562
Security: Please only download .AppImages only from a trusted distribution site. Old .AppImages may pose a security risk.
The AppImageHub (https://appimage.github.io/apps/) was recommended by AppImageKit README.md page. More AppImages can be found in the "Home" link in that same link.

use.flag: Disable watching opt folder for new .AppImages. This may speed up loading.
